casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Brian Levi BYFORD. No. 28P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Brian Levi Byford, for Byford, Brian Levi. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th of January 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Harnett County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
